org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.schema

Interface SchemaSpecificScratchpad

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AmpReportsScratchpad, ReportsTestScratchpad

    public interface SchemaSpecificScratchpad
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    An interface instances of which are created by the schema at early NiReportsEngine initialisation time by calling NiReportsSchema.generateScratchpad(NiReportsEngine). Aside from some basic functionalities which are requires from all of its implementors, the scratchpad is supposed to be a schema-specific extension of NiReportsEngine containing data, global state and utility methods

    • Method Detail

      • getPrecisionSetting

        NiPrecisionSetting getPrecisionSetting()
        Returns:
        the precision with which to run the internal calculations. Should be at least 2 orders of magnitude better than the format used for displaying

      • buildCalendarConverter

        CachingCalendarConverter buildCalendarConverter()
        Returns:
        the Calendar to use in a report in case ReportSpecification does not specify one

      • getMainIds

        default java.util.Set<java.lang.Long> getMainIds(NiReportsEngine engine,
                                                 NiReportColumn<?> col)
        returns the ids to use for fetching a given column. By default returns the engine-wide NiReportsEngine.getMainIds(), but offers schemas the ability to override it in arbitrary ways
        Parameters:
        engine - the context of the asking report
        col - the column to be fetched
        Returns:

      • getTimeRangeSubTotalColumnName

        java.lang.String getTimeRangeSubTotalColumnName(ReportSpecification reportSpecification)
        returns the localised name for column used for time range sub totals. if sub totals are not needed then null must be returned.
        Parameters:
        reportSpecification - report specification
        Returns:
        localized column name
